d: Bibi is a multifunctional building block for knit tops and dresses.

s.dartYes.d: If necessary, draft a bust dart to match side seam lengths
s.fitWaistNo.d: Create a loose fit and a more rectangular shape
s.length.underbust.d: Create a bralette top that only covers the bust.
s.length.floor.d: Create a floor-length dress. Use a negative length bonus to prevent the garment from actually dragging on the floor.
s.cutCuff.d: The **Cuff** (6) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutWaistband.d: The **Waistband** (5) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutNeckBinding.t: The neck binding is not shown
s.cutNeckBinding.d: The **Neck Binding** (3) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutArmholeBinding.t: The armhole binding is not shown
s.cutArmholeBinding.d: The **Armhole Binding** (4) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.

draftForHighBust.d: If the pattern should be drafted with a basic full bust adjustment (FBA). This will result in a more fitted garment for people with breasts.

draftForHighBustYes.d: Suggested for most people with breasts. This option only has an effect if the optional bust-related measurements are available.

draftForHighBustNo.d: Drafts a pattern using the chest measurement only.

cuffEase.d: Controls how wide the sleeves are.

sleeveLength.d: Controls the length of your sleeves

necklineBend.d: Controls the curvature of the front neckline.

backNeckBend.d: Controls the curvature of the back neckline.

necklineDepth.d: Controls how deep the neck opening plunges down at the front.

backNeckCutout.d: Controls how deep the neck opening plunges down on the back.

necklineWidth.d: Controls the width of the neck opening.

fitWaist.d: Whether or not to fit the waist.

waistEase.d: Ease at the waist (only applies when the waist is fitted).

bustEase.d: Ease at the bust. Only applies when bust adjustment is enabled.

flare.d: How much fabric to use at the bottom hem of the design. Only applies when the design goes below the seat.

dart.d: Allow creating a bust dart if this is necessary

strapWidth.d: How wide the shoulder straps are. Only applies when sleeves are disabled.

armholeCurveFront.d: How round the armhole curve is at the front. Higher options expose more skin.

armholeCurveBack.d: How round the armhole curve is at the back. Higher options leave the shoulder blades free.

armholeDropBack.d: How much the back armhole curves towards the bottom.

length.d: Which measurement line to use for the bottom hem. You can do fine adjustments using the bonus length option.

ribbingHeight.d: Controls the height of the ribbing

ribbingStretch.d: Use this to adapt the pattern to how stretchy the ribbing that you are using is.

bindingHeight.d: Controls the height of the knit binding for neck and armhole.
